block.p: Zanthe Fiona Margaret Taylor and Dr. Matthew Howard Lissak are to be married today by Rabbi Brian Z. Mayer at the Brooklyn Botanic Garden.

The bride, 29, is keeping her name. Until recently, she worked at Material, a film production company in Burbank, Calif., reading and evaluating scripts and supervising their revision. She graduated magna cum laude from Princeton and received an M.F.A. in dramaturgy and dramatic criticism from Yale. She is a daughter of Penelope and Humphrey Taylor of Manhattan. Her father is the chairman of Louis Harris & Associates, the polling and research firm in Manhattan.
Zanthe Fiona Margaret Taylor and Dr. Matthew Howard Lissak are to be married today by Rabbi Brian Z. Mayer at the Brooklyn Botanic Garden.

The bride, 29, is keeping her name. Until recently, she worked at Material, a film production company in Burbank, Calif., reading and evaluating scripts and supervising their revision. She graduated magna cum laude from Princeton and received an M.F.A. in dramaturgy and dramatic criticism from Yale. She is a daughter of Penelope and Humphrey Taylor of Manhattan. Her father is the chairman of Louis Harris & Associates, the polling and research firm in Manhattan.

Dr. Lissak, 30, is a resident in psychiatry at the University of California at Los Angeles Neuropsychiatric Institute and Hospital in Westwood, Calif. He graduated magna cum laude from Princeton and received a medical degree from Cornell University. He is a son of Bette Lissak and Dr. Louis Lissak, both of Manhattan. His mother is the owner of Paradigm Exclusives, an importing company in Manhattan. The bridegroom's father, an obstetrician and gynecologist in Manhattan, is an attending physician at the Weill Cornell Center of New York-Presbyterian Hospital and a clinical instructor at Weill Medical College of Cornell University.
